bibl.title: More about γράφεται Variants. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Lecture presented at "The Archimedes Palimpsest Colloquium" held at the Eötvös Collegium, Budapest, 18-22 September 2007. - See p. 81: the symbol gamma and rho used in some papyri to indicate a conjecture.
bibl.seg: WILSON Nigel G., More about γράφεται Variants. Avec résumé en anglais.

Lecture presented at "The Archimedes Palimpsest Colloquium" held at the Eötvös Collegium, Budapest, 18-22 September 2007. - See p. 81: the symbol gamma and rho used in some papyri to indicate a conjecture.
